Typealiases.html#/s:8ArxivKit0A18FetchRe.name: ArxivFetchResultKeypath
Typealiases.html#/s:8ArxivKit0A18FetchRe.abstract: A keypath for storing fetch task results.

Structs/ArxivSubject.html#/s:8ArxivKit0A.name: symbol
Structs/ArxivSubject.html#/s:8ArxivKit0A.abstract: Returns arXive category symbol of the subject.

Structs/ArxivSubject.html#/s:8ArxivKit0A.name: init(symbol:)
Structs/ArxivSubject.html#/s:8ArxivKit0A.abstract: Constructs ArxivSubject for provideed symbol, or nil if provided string is not a valid arXiv category symbol.

Structs/ArxivSubject.html#/s:8ArxivKit0A.name: children
Structs/ArxivSubject.html#/s:8ArxivKit0A.abstract: Returns an array of child subjects or empty array if the given subject does not have any chidlren.

Structs/ArxivRequestSpecification/Sortin.name: lastUpdateDate
Structs/ArxivRequestSpecification/Sortin.abstract: Sort returned articles by submission date of the most recent version.

Structs/ArxivRequestSpecification/Sortin.name: submissionDate
Structs/ArxivRequestSpecification/Sortin.abstract: Sort returned articles by submission date of the first version.

Structs/ArxivRequestSpecification.html#/.name: query
Structs/ArxivRequestSpecification.html#/.abstract: Returns a query used for the request or nil if the request consists of idList only.

Structs/ArxivRequestSpecification.html#/.name: idList
Structs/ArxivRequestSpecification.html#/.abstract: Returns an array od article ids. If the array is non-empty, qyery matching is limmited to specified articles.

Structs/ArxivRequestSpecification.html#/.name: startIndex
Structs/ArxivRequestSpecification.html#/.abstract: Returns zero-based index of the first article in the response. Set using startIndex(_) method.

Structs/ArxivRequestSpecification.html#/.name: itemsPerPage
Structs/ArxivRequestSpecification.html#/.abstract: Returns maximum number of articles to be returned from a single API call. Set using itemsPerPage(_) method. Default value is 50.

Structs/ArxivRequestSpecification.html#/.name: sortingCriterion
Structs/ArxivRequestSpecification.html#/.abstract: Returns sorting criterion for returned articles. Set using sorted(by:) method. Default value is .lastUpdateDate.

Structs/ArxivRequestSpecification.html#/.name: sortingOrder
Structs/ArxivRequestSpecification.html#/.abstract: Returns sorting order for returned articles. Set using sortingOrder(_) method. Default value is .descending.

Structs/ArxivRequestSpecification.html#/.name: init(query:idList:)
Structs/ArxivRequestSpecification.html#/.abstract: Creates a request for retrieving the articles matching provided query and belonging to optionally provided ID list.

Structs/ArxivRequestSpecification.html#/.name: init(idList:)
Structs/ArxivRequestSpecification.html#/.abstract: Creates a request for retrieving the articles specified by provided IDs.

Structs/ArxivRequestSpecification/Sortin.name: SortingCriterion
Structs/ArxivRequestSpecification/Sortin.abstract: Specifies sorting criteria for articles returned by API calls.

Structs/ArxivRequestSpecification/Sortin.name: SortingOrder
Structs/ArxivRequestSpecification/Sortin.abstract: Specifies sorting order for articles returned by API calls.

Structs/ArxivRequestSpecification.html#/.name: url
Structs/ArxivRequestSpecification.html#/.abstract: The arXiv API URL of the request.

Structs/ArxivQuery/Field.html#/s:8ArxivK.name: any
Structs/ArxivQuery/Field.html#/s:8ArxivK.abstract: Used for searching inside any of the above fields.

Structs/ArxivQuery/Field.html.name: Field
Structs/ArxivQuery/Field.html.abstract: Used to restrict term search to specific article field.

Structs/ArxivQuery.html#/s:8ArxivKit0A5Q.name: string
Structs/ArxivQuery.html#/s:8ArxivKit0A5Q.abstract: Returns a string representation of the query.

Structs/ArxivQuery.html#/s:8ArxivKit0A5Q.name: excluding(_:)
Structs/ArxivQuery.html#/s:8ArxivKit0A5Q.abstract: Returns a new query for retrieving the articles matching the query AND NOT the provided subqueries.

Structs/ArxivQuery.html#/s:8ArxivKit0A5Q.name: scopedTo(_:_:)
Structs/ArxivQuery.html#/s:8ArxivKit0A5Q.abstract: Creates a request for retrieving the articles matching the query and belonging to provided ID list.

Structs/ArxivResponse.html#/s:8ArxivKit0.name: id
Structs/ArxivResponse.html#/s:8ArxivKit0.abstract: Returns the value of arXiv feed id element.

Structs/ArxivResponse.html#/s:8ArxivKit0.name: title
Structs/ArxivResponse.html#/s:8ArxivKit0.abstract: Returns the value of arXiv feed title element.

Structs/ArxivResponse.html#/s:8ArxivKit0.name: link
Structs/ArxivResponse.html#/s:8ArxivKit0.abstract: Returns the value of arXiv feed link element.

Structs/ArxivResponse.html#/s:8ArxivKit0.name: updatedDate
Structs/ArxivResponse.html#/s:8ArxivKit0.abstract: Returns the value of arXiv feed updated element.

Structs/ArxivResponse.html#/s:8ArxivKit0.name: totalResults
Structs/ArxivResponse.html#/s:8ArxivKit0.abstract: Returns total number of articles matching the query as specified by ArxiveRequest.

Structs/ArxivResponse.html#/s:8ArxivKit0.name: startIndex
Structs/ArxivResponse.html#/s:8ArxivKit0.abstract: Returns zero-based index of the first article in response as specified by ArxiveRequest,

Structs/ArxivResponse.html#/s:8ArxivKit0.name: itemsPerPage
Structs/ArxivResponse.html#/s:8ArxivKit0.abstract: Returns maximum number of article per response as specified by ArxiveRequest,

Structs/ArxivResponse.html#/s:8ArxivKit0.name: entries
Structs/ArxivResponse.html#/s:8ArxivKit0.abstract: Returns an array od articles matching the query specified by ArxiveRequest.

Structs/ArxivResponse.html#/s:8ArxivKit0.name: numberOfPages
Structs/ArxivResponse.html#/s:8ArxivKit0.abstract: Returns total number od pages of the reponse.

Structs/ArxivResponse.html#/s:8ArxivKit0.name: previousPageStartIndex
Structs/ArxivResponse.html#/s:8ArxivKit0.abstract: Returns zero-based startIndex of the previous page, or nil if currentPage == 0.

Structs/ArxivResponse.html#/s:8ArxivKit0.name: nextPageStartIndex
Structs/ArxivResponse.html#/s:8ArxivKit0.abstract: Returns zero-based startIndex of the next page, or nil if currentPage == numberOfPages - 1.

Structs/ArxivEntry/Author.html.name: Author
Structs/ArxivEntry/Author.html.abstract: A single parsed author element from arXiv API reponse.

Structs/ArxivEntry.html#/s:8ArxivKit0A5E.name: submissionDate
Structs/ArxivEntry.html#/s:8ArxivKit0A5E.abstract: Returnes the date in which the first version of the article was submitted and processed.

Structs/ArxivEntry.html#/s:8ArxivKit0A5E.name: lastUpdateDate
Structs/ArxivEntry.html#/s:8ArxivKit0A5E.abstract: Returned the date on which the current version of the article was submitted and processed.

Structs/ArxivEntry.html#/s:8ArxivKit0A5E.name: categories
Structs/ArxivEntry.html#/s:8ArxivKit0A5E.abstract: Returns an array of all arXiv, ACM, or MSC category symbols describing article’s classification.

Structs/ArxivEntry.html#/s:8ArxivKit0A5E.name: primaryCategory
Structs/ArxivEntry.html#/s:8ArxivKit0A5E.abstract: Returns a symbol of article’s primary category.

Structs/ArxivEntry.html#/s:8ArxivKit0A5E.name: pdfURL
Structs/ArxivEntry.html#/s:8ArxivKit0A5E.abstract: Returns URL to article’s full text PDF file.

Structs/ArxivEntry.html#/s:8ArxivKit0A5E.name: doiURL
Structs/ArxivEntry.html#/s:8ArxivKit0A5E.abstract: Returns URL to article’s resolved DOI page if available, or nil otherwise.

Structs/ArxivEntry.html#/s:8ArxivKit0A5E.name: journalReference
Structs/ArxivEntry.html#/s:8ArxivKit0A5E.abstract: Returnes a journal reference for the article

Structs/ArxivEntry.html#/s:8ArxivKit0A5E.name: doi
Structs/ArxivEntry.html#/s:8ArxivKit0A5E.abstract: Returnes a DOI for the article if one is provided or empty string otherwise.

Structs/ArxivEntry.html#/s:8ArxivKit0A5E.name: example
Structs/ArxivEntry.html#/s:8ArxivKit0A5E.abstract: Returns an example of parsed arXiv API response entry element.

Structs/ArxivEntry.html#/s:8ArxivKit0A5E.name: version
Structs/ArxivEntry.html#/s:8ArxivKit0A5E.abstract: Returns version number of the article or nil if the id is without verrsion suffix.

Structs/ArxivEntry.html#/s:8ArxivKit0A5E.name: allVersionsIDs
Structs/ArxivEntry.html#/s:8ArxivKit0A5E.abstract: Returns an array of IDs for all available versions of the article in ascending order.

Structs/PastPeriodFromNow.html#/s:8Arxiv.name: unit
Structs/PastPeriodFromNow.html#/s:8Arxiv.abstract: Returns a calendar unit of the period.

Structs/PastPeriodFromNow.html#/s:8Arxiv.name: value
Structs/PastPeriodFromNow.html#/s:8Arxiv.abstract: Returns number of calendar units in the period.

Structs/PastPeriodFromNow.html#/s:8Arxiv.name: past(_:)
Structs/PastPeriodFromNow.html#/s:8Arxiv.abstract: Returns a period from one unit component in the past to now.

Structs/PastPeriodFromNow.html#/s:8Arxiv.name: past(_:unit:)
Structs/PastPeriodFromNow.html#/s:8Arxiv.abstract: Returns a period from value * unit components in the past to now.

Structs/PastPeriodFromNow.html#/s:8Arxiv.name: dateInterval
Structs/PastPeriodFromNow.html#/s:8Arxiv.abstract: Returns a date interval representation of the period.

Structs/ArxivAPIError.html.name: ArxivAPIError
Structs/ArxivAPIError.html.abstract: An error returned by arXiv API call.

Structs/PastPeriodFromNow.html.name: PastPeriodFromNow
Structs/PastPeriodFromNow.html.abstract: Represents a period from point in the past to now, defined in days,weeks, months or years.

Structs/ArxivEntry.html.name: ArxivEntry
Structs/ArxivEntry.html.abstract: A single parsed entry element from arXiv API reponse.

Structs/ArxivQueryBuilder.html.name: ArxivQueryBuilder
Structs/ArxivQueryBuilder.html.abstract: A custom parameter attribute that constructs query list from closures.

Structs/ArxivRequestSpecification.html.name: ArxivRequestSpecification
Structs/ArxivRequestSpecification.html.abstract: A full sppecification of an arXiv API request.

Structs/ArxivSubject.html.name: ArxivSubject
Structs/ArxivSubject.html.abstract: Representation of a single searchable arXiv subject.

Protocols/ArxivRequest.html#/s:8ArxivKit.name: url
Protocols/ArxivRequest.html#/s:8ArxivKit.abstract: Returns URL for making arXiv API calls specified by the request.

Protocols/ArxivRequest.html#/s:8ArxivKit.name: sorted(by:)
Protocols/ArxivRequest.html#/s:8ArxivKit.abstract: Returns a new request changing the sorting criterion in requestSpecification.

Protocols/ArxivRequest.html#/s:8ArxivKit.name: sortingOrder(_:)
Protocols/ArxivRequest.html#/s:8ArxivKit.abstract: Returns a new request changing the sorting order in requestSpecification.

Protocols/ArxivRequest.html#/s:8ArxivKit.name: startIndex(_:)
Protocols/ArxivRequest.html#/s:8ArxivKit.abstract: Returns a new request changing the start index in requestSpecification.

Protocols/ArxivRequest.html#/s:8ArxivKit.name: itemsPerPage(_:)
Protocols/ArxivRequest.html#/s:8ArxivKit.abstract: Returns a new request changing the number of items per single response page in requestSpecification.

Protocols/ArxivRequest.html#/s:8ArxivKit.name: fetchTask(using:completion:)
Protocols/ArxivRequest.html#/s:8ArxivKit.abstract: Uses provided session to create and return a task described by the request.

Protocols/ArxivRequest.html#/s:8ArxivKit.name: fetch(using:completion:)
Protocols/ArxivRequest.html#/s:8ArxivKit.abstract: Uses provided session to create and and run a task described by the request. Method returns the task after it starts running.

Protocols/ArxivRequest.html#/s:8ArxivKit.name: fetchTask(using:assignResultTo:on:)
Protocols/ArxivRequest.html#/s:8ArxivKit.abstract: Uses provided session to create and return a task described by the request.

Protocols/ArxivRequest.html#/s:8ArxivKit.name: fetch(using:assignResultTo:on:)
Protocols/ArxivRequest.html#/s:8ArxivKit.abstract: Uses provided session to create and and run a task described by the request. Method returns the task after it starts running.

Protocols/ArxivRequest.html.name: ArxivRequest
Protocols/ArxivRequest.html.abstract: A type providing specification of aXiv API request.

Functions.html#/s:8ArxivKit4term_2inAA0A.name: term(_:in:)
Functions.html#/s:8ArxivKit4term_2inAA0A.abstract: Returns a query for retrieving the articles containing provided term in the specified field.

Functions.html#/s:8ArxivKit7subjectyAA0A.name: subject(_:)
Functions.html#/s:8ArxivKit7subjectyAA0A.abstract: Returns a query for retrieving the articles categorised under provided arXiv subject.

Functions.html#/s:8ArxivKit9submitted2in.name: submitted(in:)
Functions.html#/s:8ArxivKit9submitted2in.abstract: Returns a query for retrieving the articles whose first version was published in provided interval.

Functions.html#/s:8ArxivKit11lastUpdated.name: lastUpdated(in:)
Functions.html#/s:8ArxivKit11lastUpdated.abstract: Returns a query for retrieving the articles whose most recent version was published in provided interval.

Functions.html#/s:8ArxivKit9submitted2in.name: submitted(in:)
Functions.html#/s:8ArxivKit9submitted2in.abstract: Returns a query for retrieving the articles whose most recent version was published in provided interval.

Functions.html#/s:8ArxivKit11lastUpdated.name: lastUpdated(in:)
Functions.html#/s:8ArxivKit11lastUpdated.abstract: Returns a query for retrieving the articles whose most recent version was published in provided time period.

Functions.html#/s:8ArxivKit3allyAA0A5Que.name: all(_:)
Functions.html#/s:8ArxivKit3allyAA0A5Que.abstract: Returns a new query for retrieving the articles matching ALL of the provided subqueries.

Functions.html#/s:8ArxivKit3anyyAA0A5Que.name: any(_:)
Functions.html#/s:8ArxivKit3anyyAA0A5Que.abstract: Returns a query for retrieving the articles matching ANY of the provided subqueries.

Extensions/URLSession.html#/s:So12NSURLS.name: fetchTask(with:completion:)
Extensions/URLSession.html#/s:So12NSURLS.abstract: Returns a task for fetching and parsing articles specified by provided request.

Extensions/URLSession.html#/s:So12NSURLS.name: fetchTask(with:assignResultTo:on:)
Extensions/URLSession.html#/s:So12NSURLS.abstract: Returns a task for fetching and parsing articles specified by provided request.

Enums/SubjectTree.html#/s:8ArxivKit11Sub.name: name
Enums/SubjectTree.html#/s:8ArxivKit11Sub.abstract: Returns group name. If the node is single subject, group name is the subject’s name.

Enums/SubjectTree.html#/s:8ArxivKit11Sub.name: children
Enums/SubjectTree.html#/s:8ArxivKit11Sub.abstract: Retunrs child nodes of the given node.

Enums/SubjectTree.html#/s:8ArxivKit11Sub.name: subject
Enums/SubjectTree.html#/s:8ArxivKit11Sub.abstract: Returns node’s subject if the node is .subject(_) or nil otherwise.

Enums/SubjectTree.html#/s:8ArxivKit11Sub.name: allSubjects
Enums/SubjectTree.html#/s:8ArxivKit11Sub.abstract: Returns a tree that can be used to recursively enumerate all available subjects

Enums/Utilities.html#/s:8ArxivKit9Utilit.name: generateSubjectSwiftConstants()
Enums/Utilities.html#/s:8ArxivKit9Utilit.abstract: Generates ArxivSubjects namespace enum and all the constants.

Enums/ArxivParserError.html#/s:8ArxivKit.name: parseError(_:)
Enums/ArxivParserError.html#/s:8ArxivKit.abstract: Thrown when XML parser reports a parsing error.

Enums/ArxivParserError.html#/s:8ArxivKit.name: validationError(_:)
Enums/ArxivParserError.html#/s:8ArxivKit.abstract: Thrown when XML parser reports a validation error.

Enums/ArxivServerError.html#/s:8ArxivKit.name: httpResponseError(statusCode:)
Enums/ArxivServerError.html#/s:8ArxivKit.abstract: Passed if URLSessionDataTask HTTP response code is not in the range [200…299].

Enums/ArxivURLError.html.name: ArxivURLError
Enums/ArxivURLError.html.abstract: A URL error that can be passed to arXiv fetch task completion handler.

Enums/ArxivServerError.html.name: ArxivServerError
Enums/ArxivServerError.html.abstract: A server error that can be passed to arXiv fetch task completion handler.

Enums/Utilities.html.name: Utilities
Enums/Utilities.html.abstract: Utilites used for library development and debugging.

Enums/OtherPhysicsSubjects.html.name: OtherPhysicsSubjects
Enums/OtherPhysicsSubjects.html.abstract: Namespace for physics subject that are not classified under Physics, Astrophysics, Condensed Matter or Nonlinear Sciences.

Enums/ElectricalEngineeringAndSystemsSci.name: ElectricalEngineeringAndSystemsScience
Enums/ElectricalEngineeringAndSystemsSci.abstract: Namespace for Electrical Engineering And Systems Science subject constants.

Enums/SubjectTree.html.name: SubjectTree
Enums/SubjectTree.html.abstract: Recursive tree structure used for grouping arXiv subjects.

Classes/ArxivParser.html.name: ArxivParser
Classes/ArxivParser.html.abstract: A parser for arXiv API atom feed.

Global%20Variables.html.name: Global Variables
Global%20Variables.html.abstract: The following global variables are available globally.

Typealiases.html.name: Type Aliases
Typealiases.html.abstract: The following type aliases are available globally.
